availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John "Jack" Dawson (Nelson County farmer and slaveholder)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, hotelkeeper. Kentucky native. Hotelkeeper in Nelson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons, including Cirilla, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 110.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 104A, 106B.
KYR-0001-004-0018.
